2.subquestion: How long does it take to install the updates?

subanswer.text: The length of time it takes to install the updates is 990412000 GB/99041200 bytes per second (since 1GB = 1024MB) times 60 seconds per minute times 99041200 minutes: 990412000 * 1024 * 60 = 60480000000000 bytes. The answer is 1735.
